actions.label: Enables or disables rules
actions.description: Enables or disables a rule or group of rules specified by UID.

configDescriptions.name: enable
configDescriptions.label: Operation that should be executed.
configDescriptions.description: If 'true' enables all specified rules, if 'false' disables them.

configDescriptions.name: ruleUIDs
configDescriptions.label: Rules UIDs.
configDescriptions.description: Specifies the rules that should be enabled or disabled.
